value: background: linear-gradient(180deg,var(--bezel-gold-hi),var(--bezel-gold)),repeating-linear-gradient(-10deg,transparent 0 6px,rgba(255,255,255,.06) 6px 7px); border-right:6px solid var(--bezel-black); box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.35), inset 0 -2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.25), 8px 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,.45); color:#111 !important;

background: radial-gradient(120% 80% at 50% 0%, var(--lcd-tint), transparent 60%), linear-gradient(180deg, #dee7c7 0%, var(--lcd-bg) 35%, #c1caa6 100%); color: var(--ink); border:8px solid var(--bezel-black); box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,.25), inset 0 0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,.15), 0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.6);

width:12px;height:12px;border-radius:50%; background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #ff9fa3, #b51217 60%, #5c0e10 100%); box-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(255,0,0,.6), inset 0 0 2px #000; border:1px solid #3e0b0d;

font-family:'Press Start 2P',system-ui,sans-serif; letter-spacing:.5px; text-transform:uppercase; border:none; box-shadow: inset 0 3px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.25), inset 0 -4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.25), 0 6px 0 var(--btn-shadow); transform: translateY(0); transition: transform .02s ease, box-shadow .02s ease, filter .1s;
transform: translateY(3px); box-shadow: inset 0 2px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.18), inset 0 -2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.28), 0 3px 0 var(--btn-shadow);
background: radial-gradient(120% 120% at 30% 20%, #e76b6d, #c53b3f 45%, #7f2024 100%); border-radius:999px; padding:16px 18px; color:#110b0b;
border-radius:12px; background: rgba(0,0,0,.08); border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.25); font-family:'Press Start 2P'; font-size:10px; color:var(--ink);
width:46px;height:20px;background:#9fb28d;border:1px solid #2b3a25; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,.15), inset 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,.25);

width:56px;height:36px;border-radius:6px;border:1px solid #2b3a25; background: linear-gradient(180deg, #dce6c8, #c9d3b2); color: var(--ink); font:700 18px/36px 'VT323', ui-monospace; text-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.25);
background: rgba(0,0,0,.06); color: var(--ink); border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.25); box-shadow:none;
filter: grayscale(100%) contrast(.9) brightness(.9) hue-rotate(65deg) saturate(.6); border:1px solid #2b3a2b; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,.18), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,.18);
background: linear-gradient(180deg, #e7edcf, #cfd8b5); border:3px solid var(--bezel-black); box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,.25), 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.5);
